vulnerability_findings.name: assembly

LibRichErrorsV06.rrevert uses assembly (LibSafeMathV06.sol#49-56)
	- LibSafeMathV06.sol#53-55

	- pragma solidity^0.6.5 (LibSafeMathV06.sol#79): it allows old versions
